sqlMap.select: select MEM_ID from member where MEM_ID =#data#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into member (MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP , MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL) values(#mem_id#, #mem_pass#, #mem_name#, #mem_bir#, #mem_zip#, #mem_add1#, #mem_add2#, #mem_hp#, #mem_mail#)
select mem_id from member where mem_id = #mem_id#
